title: Gateway to a city
creator_credit: Roderick Films International and Roderick Johnston
brief_description: A brief history of the area near Circular Quay, Sydney, known as The Rocks. Shows how this valuable site has become a neglected backwater and indicates, by the use of models, how it will look in the near future after redevelopment.
